snippet: The gunman was still at large after the mass shooting early Sunday in which dozens more were wounded, Turkish officials said....

byline.original: By an EMPLOYEE of THE NEW YORK TIMES and CHRISTOPHER MELE
byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times reported from Bursa, Turkey, and Christopher Mele from New York. Zach Montague, Kenneth R. Rosen and Timothy R. Williams contributed reporting from New York, and Rukmini Callimachi from San Diego.

lead_paragraph: The gunman was still at large after the mass shooting early Sunday in which dozens more were wounded, Turkish officials said.

headline.main: Terrorist Attack at Nightclub in Istanbul Kills Dozens
headline.print_headline: Attackers Fire, Killing Dozens in Turkish Club
